title: Relative grading
content:
How do we know if a particular course was relatively graded and if yes how do we know the cutoff for each grade? This is because if we know the cutoff for a grade then we can have better clarity whether to pay for reval or not..

Btw those who got S in mechanics (chem cycle) please drop your final isa+esa score..

comments.body: I think only maths and mechanics have been relatively graded this time, coz I got a C when I was well in the ranges of D in Mechanics, and Maths I'm also not sure what's the range but it's relatively graded. My friends with both 46 and 51 total got a D
